title: Online Appointment Booking
description: Enjoy the convience of scheduling your appointments from anywhere and enjoying prompt medical care.

title: Report Showing
description: Convinient time slots available exclusively for patients who only need to present their medical report to the doctor

title: Check Status
description: View estimated waiting time and patient count remotely, eliminate the need to physically visit the clinic.

title: Get Prescription
description: Access and manage your prescriptions anytime. Say goodbye to paper prescriptions with our online healthcare app.
